rules.description: All Applications | fn+1 → left_command+left_control+1
All Applications | fn+2 → left_command+left_control+2
All Applications | fn+3 → left_command+left_control+3
All Applications | left_option+grave_accent_and_tilde → left_command+grave_accent_and_tilde
All Applications | right_shift+spacebar → left_shift+hyphen
All Applications Except Emacs, kitty, Neovide, WezTerm | left_option+j → down_arrow (tap) and page_down (hold)
All Applications Except Emacs, kitty, Neovide, WezTerm | left_option+k → up_arrow (tap) and page_up (hold)
All Applications Except Emacs, kitty, Neovide, WezTerm | left_option+shift+h → shift+left_arrow (tap) and left_option+shift+left_arrow (hold)
All Applications Except Emacs, kitty, Neovide, WezTerm | left_option+shift+j → shift+down_arrow (tap) and left_option+shift+down_arrow (hold)
All Applications Except Emacs, kitty, Neovide, WezTerm | left_option+shift+k → shift+up_arrow (tap) and left_option+shift+up_arrow (hold)
All Applications Except Emacs, kitty, Neovide, WezTerm | left_option+shift+l → shift+right_arrow (tap) and left_option+shift+right_arrow (hold)
All Applications Except Emacs, kitty, Neovide, WezTerm | right_shift+right_command → fn+f11
All Applications Except Emacs, kitty, Neovide, WezTerm | right_shift+right_option → fn+f12
All Applications Except Emacs, kitty, Neovide, WezTerm | right_shift+left_shift → escape
All Applications Except Emacs, Neovide | left_option+h → left_arrow (tap) and left_option+left_arrow (hold)
All Applications Except Emacs, Neovide | left_option+l → right_arrow (tap) and left_option+right_arrow (hold)
Emacs, kitty, Neovide, WezTerm | caps_lock → escape (tap) and left_control (hold)
Emacs, kitty, Neovide, WezTerm | left_command → escape (tap) and left_control (hold)
Emacs, kitty, Neovide, WezTerm | left_control → escape (tap) and left_control (hold)
Emacs, kitty, Neovide, WezTerm | left_control+tab → left_command+tab
Firefox | fn+f → left_command+left_control+f
Firefox | left_command+m → left_control+m
foobar2000 | left_arrow → rewind
foobar2000 | right_arrow → fastforward
foobar2000 | spacebar → play_or_pause
kitty, WezTerm | left_control+comma → left_command+comma
kitty, WezTerm | left_control+q → left_command+q
kitty, WezTerm | left_option+j → down_arrow (tap) and left_control+n (hold)
kitty, WezTerm | left_option+k → up_arrow (tap) and left_control+p (hold)
Visual Studio Code | fn → escape (tap) and left_control (hold)
